    global c, cc
    i = x*h + y
    p[i] = not p[i]
    if p[i]:
        if i < c:
            cc += 1
        c += 1
        if p[i]:
            if i < c:
                cc += 1
    else:
        if i < c:
            cc -= 1
        c -= 1
        if p[i]:
            if i < c:
                cc -= 1
    return c - cc

            query(y, x)

    x, y = map(int, input())
    print(query(x-1, y-1))
